# guidedAccessRestrictionState(forIdentifier:)

**Type Method**

Returns the restriction state for the specified guided access restriction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor static func guidedAccessRestrictionState(forIdentifier restrictionIdentifier: String) -> UIAccessibility.GuidedAccessRestrictionState
```

## Parameters

- **restrictionIdentifier**: The string that uniquely identifies the guided access restriction.

## Return Value

The current state of the guided access restriction. The initial state of all restrictions is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAccessibility/GuidedAccessRestrictionState/allow].

## Guided Access

- **UIGuidedAccessRestrictionDelegate**: A set of methods you use to add custom restrictions for the Guided Access feature in iOS.
